definition: concerned/troubled/having sth on one's mind

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory ?
sentences.chinese: 对于只给人以荣誉的花环我又何所挂怀？

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory?
sentences.chinese: 对于只给予人荣誉的花环我又何所挂怀？

sentences.english: We need to practice being detached from all things lest we suffer at the end.
sentences.chinese: 我们平时就要练习万事不挂怀，免得临终痛苦。

trivial matter/trifle
